item.title: Debug multiprocess program in python with VSCode
item.description: How to debug a program using VS's multiprocessing module on VSCode Intended reader Python code using multiprocessing module works fine in console but VSCode Those who don’t work when trying to debug with Those who want to understand python multi-process program but do not understand without a debugger When debugging with VS Code â†“ Those who are in trouble with such an error Exception escaped from start_client failed to launch debugger for child process AssertionError: can only join a child process RuntimeError: already started How to do Debugging a program using the multiprocessing module requires the following three points
